tool.name: CNVkit Access
tool.description: Calculate the sequence-accessible coordinates in chromosomes
tool.command: ln -s '$fa_fname' ./genome.fasta && #if $exclude ln -s '$exclude' ./exclude.bed && #end if cnvkit.py access ./genome.fasta #if $exclude --exclude ./exclude.bed #end if #if $min_gap_size --min-gap-size $min_gap_size #end if --output access-excludes.bed

param.label: Minimum gap size between accessible sequence regions.
param.help: Regions separated by less than this distance will be joined together.(only use integers, don't use fractures)

param.label: EXCLUDE
param.help: Additional regions to exclude, in BED format. Can be used multiple times.

tool.help: The tool use reference genome faile and output the coordinates as a BED file.
